  .. _directly positively regulates activity of:
  .. index:: 
     single: RO_0002450; directly positively regulates activity of
     single: directly positively regulates activity of; RO_0002450

RO_0002450 - directly positively regulates activity of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for directly positively regulates activity of

    directly activates


.. topic:: Definition

    The entity A, immediately upstream of the entity B, has an activity that positively regulates an activity performed by B. 
For example, A and B may be gene products and binding of B by A positively regulates the kinase activity of B.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
